directions.d: Beat together the eggs, milk, and cinnamon.
For extra taste, add 1/4 teaspoon of ground nutmeg and/or 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract.
Add a pinch of salt and mix
Lightly oil a skillet over a medium-high heat.
Soak each side of the thick sliced bread and cook on both sides until a golden brown.
Serve hot. Optional: Add a tiny slice of butter on top of French Toast.
